con:testCase.name: User - Seller user - create/get/update/delete by admin user

con:testStep.name: RandomNoGenerator

con:config.script:
def random = (Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 10000000) + 1).toString() def randomNo = random+random+random
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "randomNo" , randomNo ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "firstName" , "firstName$randomNo") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "lastName" , "lastName$randomNo") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "nickName" , "nickName$randomNo") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "email" , "email$randomNo@test.com") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "userName" , "email$randomNo@test.com")
log.info "response is $randomNo"
